product_name: CatEye Nima Bike Light - Front - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Impressively powerful and compact, the Nima front bike light easily mounts to handlebars or seat posts, helping you see and be seen on predawn commutes and evening adventures in the saddle.
short_description: Impressively powerful and compact, the Nima front bike light easily mounts to handlebars or seat posts, helping you see and be seen on predawn commutes and evening adventures in the saddle.
